citations.narrative:
There was an incident involving improper handling of a prairie vole. On March 11, 2024, a vole escaped during a cage
change and leaped to the floor. A net was used for recapture and the metal frame struck the animal causing injury. There
was blood observed on the floor and the animal was observed to have decreased consciousness and labored breathing.
The animal was euthanized due to the injury.
Failure to handle animals in a careful manner can lead to trauma including death.
Handling of all animals must be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma, behavioral stress,
physical harm, or unnecessary discomfort.
Corrective actions included changes in procedures for handling and recapturing voles. Correct by continuing to handle
animals in a careful manner from June 12, 2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.38(f)(1)  Critical
   
Miscellaneous. 
There was an incident involving improper handling of a prairie vole. On March 11, 2024, a vole escaped during a cage 
change and leaped to the floor. A net was used for recapture and the metal frame struck the animal causing injury. There 
was blood observed on the floor and the animal was observed to have decreased consciousness and labored breathing. 
The animal was euthanized due to the injury. 
Failure to handle animals in a careful manner can lead to trauma including death. 
Handling of all animals must be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not cause trauma, behavioral stress, 
physical harm, or unnecessary discomfort. 
Corrective actions included changes in procedures for handling and recapturing voles. Correct by continuing to handle 
animals in a careful manner from June 12, 2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
